front.title: Use Cases for Computing-Aware Intelligent Transportation Systems

author.organization: Department of Computer Science and Engineering

abstract.t: This document proposes use cases for Computing-Aware Intelligent Transportation Systems (ITS). Computing-Aware Traffic Steering (CATS) provides the steering of packets of a traffic flow for a specific service request toward the corresponging service instance at an edge computing server at a service site. The use cases for Computing-Aware ITS include Context-Aware Navigation for Terrestrial Vehicles and Unmanned Aerial Vehicles (UVA) and Edge-Assisted Cluster-Based MAC Protocol for Software-Defined Vehicles.
